about_the_game:
Being a Goddess requires willpower and sometimes the right accessories to help lead your team to victory! And with the Dengeki Accessory Set, the Goddesses can now rock these Dengeki themed accessories and fight any of those who stop their way!

The Dengeki Accessory Set includes:
• Dengeki Earrings: Neptune Only
• Dengeki Crown: Noire Only
• Dengeki Scarf: Blanc Only
• Dengeki Necklace: Vert Only
• Dengeki Belt: Chrome Only

*Note: Accessories are not visible during battle or cutscenes.
detailed_description:
Being a Goddess requires willpower and sometimes the right accessories to help lead your team to victory! And with the Dengeki Accessory Set, the Goddesses can now rock these Dengeki themed accessories and fight any of those who stop their way!

The Dengeki Accessory Set includes:

*Note: Accessories are not visible during battle or cutscenes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 32bit, 64bit (DirectX 12 equivalent)
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.3GHz or AMD A9 2.9GHz equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Mobility Radeon HD 5xxx, 1GB VRAM 5000
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX) compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit (DirectX 12 equivalent)
  • Processor: Intel i5 3.3GHz or AMD FX-8350 4.0GHz equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960、ATI Mobility Radeon R9 290
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX) compatible sound card
